metadata.title: CVE-2024-56667 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/i915: Fix NULL pointer dereference in capture_engineWhen the intel_context structure contains NULL,it raises a NULL pointer dereference error in drm_info().(cherry picked from commit 754302a5bc1bd8fd3b7d85c168b0a1af6d4bba4d)

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
